item.description:
As part of the monthly First Thursday at the Wadsworth Atheneum is the Norwegian film "Insomnia". First Thursday runs from 5:00 pm -8:00 pm. The movie follows at 8:00 pm.

Insomnia
1997 in Norwegian with subtitles

A criminal investigator is sent to a town in the north of Norway to help the local police solve the murder of a young girl. As he struggles with insomnia - due to the perputual daylight of the Norwegian summer - he plays an intense game of wits with the murderer.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be uopstairs at First Thursday, then waiting ing in the lower lobby.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Insomnia
